meanings.definition: The sound made by a sheep.
meanings.sent1: The maa of the sheep echoed through the meadow.
meanings.sent2: I woke up to the gentle maa of the sheep in the distance.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child tried to mimic the maa of the sheep.
meanings.sent4: The maa of the sheep was a soothing lullaby in the quiet night.
meanings.sent5: The maa of the sheep was a familiar melody to the shepherd.

meanings.sent1: My maa prepares delicious meals for our family.
meanings.sent2: I called my maa to share the good news with her.
meanings.sent3: The children surprised their maa with a handmade card.
meanings.sent4: Her love enveloped me like a warm embrace from my maa.
meanings.sent5: The bond between a child and their maa is unbreakable.

meanings.sent1: The Maori elder greeted us with a warm maa.
meanings.sent2: We exchanged maa with the Maori tribe as a sign of respect.
meanings.sent3: The tourists tried to learn the proper way to perform the maa.
meanings.sent4: The maa symbolized the unity and connection of the Maori people.
meanings.sent5: The maa was a beautiful gesture of welcome and acceptance.
